title: Unable to spawn robots in Ignition

content.raw:
After downloading the newest version of the tunnel circuit, we are no longer able to spawn robots using the command shown below.

`ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1`

Inside ` ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/`
 the X1 Config 1 file is no longer present and instead there are X1 UGV, X2 UGV, X3 UAV and X4 UAV files located there.

Is there something that can be done to spawn robots?
content.html:
After downloading the newest version of the tunnel circuit, we are no longer able to spawn robots using the command shown below.

ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1

Inside ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/ the X1 Config 1 file is no longer present and instead there are X1 UGV, X2 UGV, X3 UAV and X4 UAV files located there.

Is there something that can be done to spawn robots?
